API_ERRORS.106: We are sorry. We haven´t been able to verify your account. Please make sure you have added your details correctly
API_ERRORS.108: Your email address or your password is incorrect. Please make sure you have added your details correctly
API_ERRORS.109: Your email address or your password is incorrect. Please make sure you have added your details correctly
API_ERRORS.110: You haven´t become an Airbnb hosts yet. Please add a property before your link your account.
API_ERRORS.112: The email you have introduced doesn’t exist. Remember you have to use the same email you used to sign up in Airbnb. Please make sure you have added your details correctly or create and Airbnb account.
API_ERRORS.113: We are sorry. We haven´t been able to verify your account. Please make sure you have added your details correctly.
API_ERRORS.115: We are sorry. We haven´t been able to connect with your Airbnb account because you use your Facebook account to enter Airbnb. You'll need an Airbnb login and password to sign up for Vayoo.
API_ERRORS.116: We are sorry. We haven´t been able to connect with your Airbnb account because you use your Google account to enter Airbnb. You'll need an Airbnb login and password to sign up for Vayoo.
API_ERRORS.117: We are sorry. We haven´t been able to connect with your Airbnb account because you use your Facebook account to enter Airbnb. You'll need an Airbnb login and password to sign up for Vayoo.
API_ERRORS.118: Your Airbnb listing is in Snooze Mode or Deactivated. Please reactivate your listing in Airbnb and retry again.
API_ERRORS.119: The password you entered has less than 8 characters. Please make sure you have added your details correctly.
API_ERRORS.122: Your Airbnb listing is in Snooze Mode or Deactivated. Please reactivate your listing in Airbnb and retry again.
API_ERRORS.123: We are sorry! Our server hadn't found your property yet. In less than an hour, your property will be available. We’ll send you a notification.
API_ERRORS.124: Our apologies, none of your properties have been monitored yet. Now you have tried to link your account, our servers will find them and notify you in less than an hour. Sorry for the inconvenience.
API_ERRORS.503: We haven´t been able to verify your account because Airbnb’s site is experiencing some problems. Please try again in a while.

TUTORIAL.SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to Is my listing findable?
TUTORIAL.SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Is my listing findable? Is the new App powered by Vayoo that indicates your daily search position on Airbnb.
TUTORIAL.SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use Is my listing findable?
TUTORIAL.SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Link your account for a better and faster optimization. Please note that there is no human interaction in this process, we do not see and we do not keep your password. All the process is secured by an encrypting file system.
TUTORIAL.SLIDE3_TITLE: Have a look at your calendar
TUTORIAL.SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Here you can have can have an overview of the following months. Remember that your average search position is calculated from the next 21 free days. The further you free days are in your calendar, the higher your search position will be as there will be more competition in your area.
TUTORIAL.SLIDE4_DESCRIPTION: Here you can see the different search positions in which you are depending on different filters.

WELCOME.FIND_PROPERTY: Find your listing on the map

ADD_PROPERTY.TITLE: How to find your listing?
ADD_PROPERTY.FIND_PROPERTY: Find your listing on the map

LINK_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Link
LINK_ACCOUNT.INCORRECT_PASWORD: We are sorry. We haven´t been able to verify your account. Please make sure you have added your details correctly

ENTER_AIRBNB_ID.TITLE: Enter Airbnb id
ENTER_AIRBNB_ID.TIP_1: Your Airbnb listing link is what you see in the address bar at the top of your browser when you visit your property at Airbnb's web site. It has the form of:
ENTER_AIRBNB_ID.TIP_2: Where xxxxxxx is your Airbnb listing Id.
ENTER_AIRBNB_ID.TIP_3: Tip: You can also introduce just your listing Id

POSITION_OVERVIEW.DATA_DESCRIPTION: The Airbnb page in which your listing appears when searching in {{ value }}
POSITION_OVERVIEW.PROCESSING_DESCRIPTION: It can take up to 24 hours. We'll send you a notification once is done

POSITION.LAST_DAY_PERIOD: This is the last day of a period and your listing does not show due to the minimum number of nights you have specified in your Airbnb settings
POSITION.MINIMUM_NIGTHS_PROBLEM: Your listing can not appear when searching due to the minimum number of nights per booking that you have specified in Airbnb
POSITION.NOT_APPEARS: Your listing does not appear this day in the first 18 pages when searching in '{{value}}' without any filters. (It will probably appear if the Airbnb user applies some filters.)

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.REMAINING_FREE_DAYS: You have {{ value }} days left to test
SETTINGS.SUBSCRIBE_DESCRIPTION: Subscribe to get this listing's position data

HELP.TITLE: Help
HELP.THANKS: We will get back to you as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience.
